description: This Dart source file defines the ApiClient class, which provides methods for making HTTP requests (GET, POST, PATCH) to a backend API. It manages request headers, including authorization tokens retrieved from shared preferences, and handles JSON encoding/decoding. The class follows a singleton pattern and uses environment variables for the base URL.
